title: The Truth About Juice Cleanses
description:
Jillian shares ways to boost your immune system during the Coronavirus. Plus, the truth about juice cleanses, and email questions on making exercise a habit, what breaks a fast, and more!

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
